channel.title: [PI] Capital letters
channel.description:
How do I make it so that the first letter of a name is capital. Because now it looks like this:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/24fkb9t.png[/img]
Also, whenever someone yells, there can be no capital letters(as shown in the picture) how would I fix that too?
Please help!
